oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: UNICEF tour - Australia - 1972 - part 3
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part three of a 1972 UNICEF fundraiser tour performance in Australia. Featuring Tex Ritter (host), Connie Smith (performer), and Harold Williams (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tex Ritter; Connie Smith; Harold Williams
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Louisiana Man (Connie Smith) [unconfirmed] -- (02:27) Once A Day (Connie Smith) -- (05:02) Smith thanks the audience and talks about getting to know her audience -- (05:30) Smith talks about her love of God -- (06:23) How Great Thou Art (Connie Smith) -- (10:56) Tex Ritter thanks Connie Smith and introduces Harold Williams -- (12:38) Williams introduces the first tune -- (12:58) Teardrops (Harold Williams) -- (15:20) [crowd applause]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: UNICEF.; Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Ritter, Tex; Smith, Connie, 1941-;
